quote_first: The A-B elevator was our elevator, the elevator on which the paramedics came up at 9:20 p.m., the elevator on which they took John (and me) downstairs to the ambulance at
title: The Year of Magical Thinking
author: Joan Didion

quote_first: If you do not tell me everything I need to know by-he looked at the watch on his wrist-by
quote_last: tomorrow night, you will be executed. You and the three exnays.
title: Among the Betrayed
author: Margaret Peterson Haddix
